AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Table
AD_TABLE.HELP: In Table table are stored all the tables used in the application. This data should be the same as the defined physically in the DB.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.TableName) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, AD_Table T WHERE AD_Table_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Column
AD_TABLE.DESCRIPTION: Table Column definitions Used in Column
AD_TABLE.HELP: Defines the columns of a table The Used in Column Tab defines the table and column this element resides in.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.ColumnName) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, AD_Column T WHERE AD_Column_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Reference
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Reference Tab defines the references that are used to validate data
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT COALESCE(TO_CHAR(MAX(TT.Name)), TO_CHAR(T.Name)) FROM AD_Reference_Trl TT WHERE TT.AD_Reference_ID=T.AD_Reference_ID AND TT.AD_LANGUAGE=L.AD_LANGUAGE) ||' - '||(SELECT NAME FROM AD_REF_LIST_V WHERE AD_Language=L.AD_LANGUAGE AND Value=T.ValidationType AND AD_Reference_ID=2) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, AD_Reference T WHERE AD_Reference_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Ref_Table
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Table Validation Tab defines tables to validate data
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Ref_List
AD_TABLE.HELP: The List Validation Tab defines lists to validate data
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT COALESCE(TO_CHAR(MAX(TT.Name)), TO_CHAR(T.Name)) FROM AD_Ref_List_Trl TT WHERE TT.AD_Ref_List_ID=T.AD_Ref_List_ID AND TT.AD_LANGUAGE=L.AD_LANGUAGE) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, AD_Ref_List T WHERE AD_Ref_List_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Window
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Window table defines each window in the system.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT COALESCE(TO_CHAR(MAX(TT.Name)), TO_CHAR(T.Name)) FROM AD_Window_Trl TT WHERE TT.AD_Window_ID=T.AD_Window_ID AND TT.AD_LANGUAGE=L.AD_LANGUAGE) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, AD_Window T WHERE AD_Window_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Tab
AD_TABLE.DESCRIPTION: Tab definition within a window holds fields
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Tab Tab defines each Tab within a Window. Each Tab contains a discrete selection of fields.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT COALESCE(TO_CHAR(MAX(TT.Name)), TO_CHAR(T.Name)) FROM AD_Tab_Trl TT WHERE TT.AD_Tab_ID=T.AD_Tab_ID AND TT.AD_LANGUAGE=L.AD_LANGUAGE) ||' - '||(SELECT (SELECT COALESCE(TO_CHAR(MAX(TTT.Name)), TO_CHAR(TT.Name)) FROM AD_Window_Trl TTT WHERE TTT.AD_Window_ID=TT.AD_Window_ID AND TTT.AD_LANGUAGE=L.AD_LANGUAGE) FROM AD_Window TT WHERE TT.AD_Window_ID=T.AD_Window_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, AD_Tab T WHERE AD_Tab_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Field
AD_TABLE.DESCRIPTION: Field definitions in tabs in windows
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Field table defines the Fields displayed within a tab. Changes made to the Field Tab become visible after restart due to caching
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT COALESCE(TO_CHAR(MAX(TT.Name)), TO_CHAR(T.Name)) FROM AD_Field_Trl TT WHERE TT.AD_Field_ID=T.AD_Field_ID AND TT.AD_LANGUAGE=L.AD_LANGUAGE) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, AD_Field T WHERE AD_Field_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Val_Rule
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Validation Rules Tab defines all dynamic rules used when entering and maintaining columns and fields.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, AD_Val_Rule T WHERE AD_Val_Rule_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Message
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Message Tab displays error message text and menu messages
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Value) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, AD_Message T WHERE AD_Message_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Language
AD_TABLE.DESCRIPTION: System and User Languages Select your Language
AD_TABLE.HELP: If you want to add an additional User Interface language, select "System Language". Otherwise, the system allows you to just translate elements for printing documents. The Language needs to be a (verified) System Language
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, AD_Language T WHERE AD_Language_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Client
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Client Definition Tab defines a unique client.Do not create a new client in this window, but use "Initial Client Setup" (System Administrator Role) to set up the required security and access rules. If you create a new client here, you will not be abl
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, AD_Client T WHERE AD_Client_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_PaymentTerm
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Payment Term defines the different payments terms that you offer to your Business Partners when paying invoices and also those terms which your Vendors offer you for payment of your invoices. On the standard invoice, the Name and the Document Note
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT COALESCE(TO_CHAR(MAX(TT.Name)), TO_CHAR(T.Name)) FROM C_PaymentTerm_Trl TT WHERE TT.C_PaymentTerm_ID=T.C_PaymentTerm_ID AND TT.AD_LANGUAGE=L.AD_LANGUAGE) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_PaymentTerm T WHERE C_PaymentTerm_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_User
AD_TABLE.DESCRIPTION: User Maintain User within the system - Internal or Business Partner Contact
AD_TABLE.HELP: The User Tab defines the log in for Users who have access to the system. The User identifies a unique user in the system. This could be an internal user or a business partner contact
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, AD_User T WHERE AD_User_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Sequence
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Sequence Tab defines the numeric sequencing to use for documents. These can also include a alpha suffix and / or prefix.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, AD_Sequence T WHERE AD_Sequence_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Menu
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Menu Tab defines the tree structured menu which will be used for the selected Organization.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT COALESCE(TO_CHAR(MAX(TT.Name)), TO_CHAR(T.Name)) FROM AD_Menu_Trl TT WHERE TT.AD_Menu_ID=T.AD_Menu_ID AND TT.AD_LANGUAGE=L.AD_LANGUAGE) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, AD_Menu T WHERE AD_Menu_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Workflow
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Workflow Tab defines Workflows in the system.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT COALESCE(TO_CHAR(MAX(TT.Name)), TO_CHAR(T.Name)) FROM AD_Workflow_Trl TT WHERE TT.AD_Workflow_ID=T.AD_Workflow_ID AND TT.AD_LANGUAGE=L.AD_LANGUAGE) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, AD_Workflow T WHERE AD_Workflow_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Task
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Task Tab defines the unique tasks that will be used.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT COALESCE(TO_CHAR(MAX(TT.Name)), TO_CHAR(T.Name)) FROM AD_Task_Trl TT WHERE TT.AD_Task_ID=T.AD_Task_ID AND TT.AD_LANGUAGE=L.AD_LANGUAGE) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, AD_Task T WHERE AD_Task_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Message_Trl
AD_TABLE.HELP: This tab contains the messages translation to different languages. It is important to check the translated option.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Menu_Trl
AD_TABLE.DESCRIPTION: Menu Translation - May not need to be translated Please note, that most of the menu translations are derived from Window/Form/.. translation!
AD_TABLE.HELP: Menu translations are derived from Window, Process, etc. You only need to translate Summary level items. Run Synchronize Terminology to update menu translation.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Sequence_Audit
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Sequence_No
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Tab_Trl
AD_TABLE.DESCRIPTION: Allows the translation of any tab of the application
AD_TABLE.HELP: Allows the translation of any tab of the application.After the edition, the window must be regenerated.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Task_Trl
AD_TABLE.DESCRIPTION: Allows the translation of any task of the application.
AD_TABLE.HELP: Allows the translation of any task of the application. After the edition, the window must be regenerated.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_TaskInstance
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.AD_TaskInstance_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, AD_TaskInstance T WHERE AD_TaskInstance_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Reference_Trl
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Field_Trl
AD_TABLE.DESCRIPTION: Menu Translation - May not need to be translated Allows the translation of any field of the application. Please note, that most of the fields translations are derived from Element!
AD_TABLE.HELP: Fields are automatically translated, if centrally maintained. You only need to translate not centrally maintained Fields. Allows the translation of any field of the application. After the edition, the window must be regenerated.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_WF_Instance
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.AD_WF_Instance_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, AD_WF_Instance T WHERE AD_WF_Instance_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_WF_Node
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Node Tab defines each Node or step in this Workflow.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, AD_WF_Node T WHERE AD_WF_Node_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_WF_Node_Trl
AD_TABLE.DESCRIPTION: Allows the translation of any workflow node of the application.
AD_TABLE.HELP: Allows the translation of any workflow node of the application. After the edition, the window must be regenerated.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_WF_NodeNext
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Next Nodes Tab defines the order or Nodes or Steps in a Workflow.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Window_Trl
AD_TABLE.HELP: This tab contains the windows translation to different languages. It is important to check the translated option.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Workflow_Trl
AD_TABLE.DESCRIPTION: Allows the translation of any workflow of the application.
AD_TABLE.HELP: Allows the translation of any workflow of the application. After the edition, the window must be regenerated.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: Test
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, Test T WHERE Test_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Ref_List_Trl
AD_TABLE.DESCRIPTION: Allows the translation of any reference list of the application
AD_TABLE.HELP: Allows the translation of any reference list of the application. After the edition, the window must be regenerated.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_Calendar
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Calendar Tab defines each calendar that will be used by an Organization.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_Calendar T WHERE C_Calendar_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_Conversion_Rate
AD_TABLE.DESCRIPTION: Define currency conversion rates Define Currency Conversion Rates
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.C_Conversion_Rate_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_Conversion_Rate T WHERE C_Conversion_Rate_ID=:c_ID
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Conversion Rate defines the rates to use when converting a source currency to an accounting or reporting currency. The Conversion Rates tab is used to define conversion rates to be used when converting document amounts from one currency to another. Conversion rates can be defined for multiple rate types. They can also be effective for a defined range of dates.

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_Currency
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Currency defines any currency you will transact with or report in.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.ISO_Code) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_Currency T WHERE C_Currency_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_Element
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Element defines the Name, Description and Format for an Element. Additionally, a Type of Account or User Defined is selected. Each Account Schema must have an Account Element type. The User Defined Elements are optional.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_Element T WHERE C_Element_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_Period
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Period Tab defines a Period No, Name and Start Date for each Calendar Year. Each period begins on the defined Start Date and ends one day prior to the next period's Start Date.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_Period T WHERE C_Period_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_UOM
AD_TABLE.HELP: Unit of Measure defines a non monetary Unit of Measure.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT COALESCE(TO_CHAR(MAX(TT.Name)), TO_CHAR(T.Name)) FROM C_UOM_Trl TT WHERE TT.C_UOM_ID=T.C_UOM_ID AND TT.AD_LANGUAGE=L.AD_LANGUAGE) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_UOM T WHERE C_UOM_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Org
AD_TABLE.DESCRIPTION: Define Organizations Maintain Organizationt Accounting Dimension Tree
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, AD_Org T WHERE AD_Org_ID=:c_ID
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Organization Tab is used to define an Organization. Each Organization has a Key and Name and optionally a Description. When adding a new organization, you must re-login to be able to access the new organization. Please note that you will not be able to create new entities in this window if you have not default set for all mandatory values!

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Role
AD_TABLE.DESCRIPTION: Define responsibility roles Role with Data Access Restriction
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, AD_Role T WHERE AD_Role_ID=:c_ID
AD_TABLE.HELP:
Define the role and add the client and organizations the role has access to. You can give users access to this role and modify the access of this role to windows, forms, processes and reports as well as tasks.
If the Role User Level is Manual, the as Select Role for with Data Access Restrictions

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_User_Roles
AD_TABLE.DESCRIPTION: User Roles Users with this Role
AD_TABLE.HELP: The User Roles Tab define the Roles each user may have. The Roles will determine what windows, tasks, processes and workflows that a User has access to. The User Assignment Tab displays Users who have been defined for this Role.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_Location
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Location Tab defines the location of an Organization.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Address1)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.Address2)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.Postal)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.City)||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM C_Region TT WHERE TT.C_Region_ID=T.C_Region_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT (SELECT COALESCE(TO_CHAR(MAX(TTT.Name)), TO_CHAR(TT.Name)) FROM C_Country_Trl TTT WHERE TTT.C_Country_ID=TT.C_Country_ID AND TTT.AD_LANGUAGE=L.AD_LANGUAGE) FROM C_Country TT WHERE TT.C_Country_ID=T.C_Country_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_Location T WHERE C_Location_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_NonBusinessDay
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Non Business Days Tab defines those days to exclude when calculating the due date for given payment terms. For example, if an invoice terms was Net 10 days and the Invoice Date was 2/17/2000 the due date would be 2/27/2000. If 2/27/2000 was defined
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_NonBusinessDay T WHERE C_NonBusinessDay_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_Region
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Region Tab defines a Region within a Country. This tab is enabled only if the Has Region checkbox is selected for the Country.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_Region T WHERE C_Region_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_Country
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Country Tab defines any country in which you do business. Values entered here are referenced in location records for Business Partners.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT COALESCE(TO_CHAR(MAX(TT.Name)), TO_CHAR(T.Name)) FROM C_Country_Trl TT WHERE TT.C_Country_ID=T.C_Country_ID AND TT.AD_LANGUAGE=L.AD_LANGUAGE) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_Country T WHERE C_Country_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_UOM_Conversion
AD_TABLE.DESCRIPTION: Define standard Unit of Measure Conversion
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Conversion defines the rates for converting a Unit of Measure. The system provides some automatic conversions between units of measures (e.g. minute, hour, day, working day, etc.) if they are not explicitly defined here.Conversions need to be dir
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.C_UOM_Conversion_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_UOM_Conversion T WHERE C_UOM_Conversion_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_ValidCombination
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Account Combination Tab defines and displays valid account combination. An Alias can be defined to facilitate document entry.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Combination) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_ValidCombination T WHERE C_ValidCombination_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_Year
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Year Window is used to define each year for the specified calendar.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Year) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_Year T WHERE C_Year_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_BP_Customer_Acct
AD_TABLE.HELP: Defines the default accounts to use when this business partner is referenced on an accounts receivable transaction.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM C_BPartner TT WHERE TT.C_BPartner_ID=T.C_BPartner_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM C_AcctSchema TT WHERE TT.C_AcctSchema_ID=T.C_AcctSchema_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_BP_Customer_Acct T WHERE C_Bp_Customer_Acct_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_BP_Employee_Acct
AD_TABLE.HELP: Defines the default accounts to use when this business partner is referenced on a expense reimbursement.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_BP_Vendor_Acct
AD_TABLE.HELP: Defines the default accounts to use when this business partner is referenced in an accounts payable transaction.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM C_BPartner TT WHERE TT.C_BPartner_ID=T.C_BPartner_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM C_AcctSchema TT WHERE TT.C_AcctSchema_ID=T.C_AcctSchema_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_BP_Vendor_Acct T WHERE C_Bp_Vendor_Acct_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_City
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Cities Tab defines Cities within a Country or Region. Cities entered here are not referenced when entering the address.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_City T WHERE C_City_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_ElementValue
AD_TABLE.HELP: The individual valid values for the Element. The values must conform to the format defined. If the Element is an Account Type then the Account Classification (Asset, Liability etc) and posting controls are also defined
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Value)||' - '||(SELECT COALESCE(TO_CHAR(MAX(TT.Name)), TO_CHAR(T.Name)) FROM C_ElementValue_Trl TT WHERE TT.C_ElementValue_ID=T.C_ElementValue_ID AND TT.AD_LANGUAGE=L.AD_LANGUAGE) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_ElementValue T WHERE C_ElementValue_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_Warehouse
AD_TABLE.HELP: Warehouse defines each Warehouse that is used to store products.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, M_Warehouse T WHERE M_Warehouse_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_Warehouse_Acct
AD_TABLE.HELP: Defines the Accounting parameters to be used for inventory in that Warehouse.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Preference
AD_TABLE.HELP: Defines preferences (default values) for a user.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Attribute) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, AD_Preference T WHERE AD_Preference_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Process_Access
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Process Access Tab defines the Processes and type of access that this Role is granted. The Report Access Tab determines who can access a report or process
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Task_Access
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Task Access Tab defines the Task and type of access that this Role is granted. The Task Access Tab defines the Roles that will have access to this task and the type of access each Role is granted.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Window_Access
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Window Access Tab defines the Roles which have access to this Window. The Window Access Tab defines the Windows and type of access that this Role is granted.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Workflow_Access
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Workflow Access Tab defines the Workflows and type of access that this Role is granted. The Workflow Access Tab defines the Roles who have access to this Workflow.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_Project
AD_TABLE.HELP: Contains the Value, Name and Description for each project. It also is defines the tracks the amounts assigned to, committed to and used for this project. This tab is used in order to introduce information regarding a project: Address, status, …
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Value)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_Project T WHERE C_Project_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_Project_Acct
AD_TABLE.DESCRIPTION: Define Project Accounting Define Project Accounting
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Accounting Tab is used to define the Asset Account to use when a project is completed and the associated asset realized. The Accounting Tab is used to define the Asset Account to use when a project is completed and the associated asset realized.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_Locator
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Locator defines any Locators for that Warehouse.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Value) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, M_Locator T WHERE M_Locator_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_Product
AD_TABLE.HELP: Defines each product and identifies it for use in price lists and orders. The Location is the default location when receiving the stored products.

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_Product_Category
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Product Category defines unique groupings of products. Product categories can be used in building price lists.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, M_Product_Category T WHERE M_Product_Category_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_Product_PO
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Purchasing defines the pricing and rules ( pack quantity, UPC, minimum order quantity) for each product. The Product Details allows you to display and maintain all products for a selected Vendor.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_Substitute
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Substitute Tab defines products which may be used as a replacement for the selected product.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_Approval
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Approval Tab defines the approval types to be used in documents.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_Approval T WHERE C_Approval_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_DocType
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Document Definition Tab defines the processing parameters and controls for the document.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT COALESCE(TO_CHAR(MAX(TT.Name)), TO_CHAR(T.Name)) FROM C_DocType_Trl TT WHERE TT.C_DocType_ID=T.C_DocType_ID AND TT.AD_LANGUAGE=L.AD_LANGUAGE) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_DocType T WHERE C_DocType_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: GL_Category
AD_TABLE.HELP: The GL Category Tab defines optional identifiers for a document or journal. Each Category may be used on a document, manual journal or import
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, GL_Category T WHERE GL_Category_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: GL_Journal
AD_TABLE.HELP: The GL Journal Tab defines the control parameters for a single GL Journal.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.DocumentNo) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, GL_Journal T WHERE GL_Journal_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: GL_JournalBatch
AD_TABLE.HELP: The GL Journal Batch Tab defines the control parameters for a Journal Batch. A Batch can consist of multiple Journals.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.DocumentNo) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, GL_JournalBatch T WHERE GL_JournalBatch_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: GL_JournalLine
AD_TABLE.HELP: The GL Journal Line Tab defines the individual debit and credit transactions that comprise a journal.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Line) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, GL_JournalLine T WHERE GL_JournalLine_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_ClientInfo
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Client Info Tab defines the details for each client. The accounting rules and high level defaults are defined here. The Calendar is used to determine if a period is open or closed.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_OrgInfo
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Organization Info Tab is used to define an Organization's address, DUNS number and Tax Identification number
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_PeriodControl
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Period Control records the status of a Period (Never Opened, Opened, Closed) for each of the DocBaseTypes.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.C_PeriodControl_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_PeriodControl T WHERE C_PeriodControl_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_SalesRegion
AD_TABLE.DESCRIPTION: Sales Region Maintain Sales Region Accounting Dimension Tree
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Sales Region defines the different regions where you do business. Sales Regions can be used when generating reports or calculating commissions.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_SalesRegion T WHERE C_SalesRegion_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_Replenish
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Replenishment defines the type of replenishment quantities. This is used for automated ordering.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_ProductPrice
AD_TABLE.DESCRIPTION: Product Pricing Maintain Product Prices Expense Type Pricing Resource Pricing
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Pricing displays the List, Standard and Limit prices for each price list a product is contained in. The Price List displays the prices for a product based on the selected price list. The Pricing Tab displays the List, Standard and Limit prices for each price list a product is contained in.

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_TaxCategory
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Tax Category is used to define and maintain Tax Categories. Each Product is associated with a Tax Category. This facilitates adapting to changes in taxation.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT COALESCE(TO_CHAR(MAX(TT.Name)), TO_CHAR(T.Name)) FROM C_TaxCategory_Trl TT WHERE TT.C_TaxCategory_ID=T.C_TaxCategory_ID AND TT.AD_LANGUAGE=L.AD_LANGUAGE) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_TaxCategory T WHERE C_TaxCategory_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_Shipper
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Shippers table defines any entity who will provide shipping to or shipping from an Organization.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, M_Shipper T WHERE M_Shipper_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Attachment
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Attachment tab displays the attributes of an attachment.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Title) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, AD_Attachment T WHERE AD_Attachment_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_PriceList
AD_TABLE.HELP: Price lists determine currency of the document as well as tax treatment.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, M_PriceList T WHERE M_PriceList_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_InvoiceSchedule
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Invoice Schedule Tab defines the frequency for which batch invoices will be generated for a Business Partner.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_InvoiceSchedule T WHERE C_InvoiceSchedule_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_Order
AD_TABLE.HELP: Table where there are all the orders. The purchase orders and the sales orders.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.DocumentNo)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.DateOrdered)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.GrandTotal) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_Order T WHERE C_Order_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_OrderLine
AD_TABLE.HELP: The table defines the individual line items that comprise an Order
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.DocumentNo)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TT.DateOrdered)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TT.GrandTotal) FROM C_Order TT WHERE TT.C_Order_ID=T.C_Order_ID) ||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.Line)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.LineNetAmt) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_OrderLine T WHERE C_OrderLine_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_Tax
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Tax Rate Window defines the different taxes used for each tax category.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT COALESCE(TO_CHAR(MAX(TT.Name)), TO_CHAR(T.Name)) FROM C_Tax_Trl TT WHERE TT.C_Tax_ID=T.C_Tax_ID AND TT.AD_LANGUAGE=L.AD_LANGUAGE) ||' - '||(SELECT (SELECT COALESCE(TO_CHAR(MAX(TTT.Name)), TO_CHAR(TT.Name)) FROM C_TaxCategory_Trl TTT WHERE TTT.C_TaxCategory_ID=TT.C_TaxCategory_ID AND TTT.AD_LANGUAGE=L.AD_LANGUAGE) FROM C_TaxCategory TT WHERE TT.C_TaxCategory_ID=T.C_TaxCategory_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_Tax T WHERE C_Tax_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_AcctSchema
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Accounting Schema Tab defines the controls used for accounting. Each Organization will select an Accounting Schema to use.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_AcctSchema T WHERE C_AcctSchema_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_AcctSchema_GL
AD_TABLE.HELP: The General Ledger defines error and balance handling to use as well as the necessary accounts for posting to General Ledger.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM C_AcctSchema TT WHERE TT.C_AcctSchema_ID=T.C_AcctSchema_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_AcctSchema_GL T WHERE C_AcctSchema_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: Fact_Acct
AD_TABLE.HELP: Recods accounting entries of all accounting schemas.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Fact_Acct_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, Fact_Acct T WHERE Fact_Acct_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: GL_Budget
AD_TABLE.DESCRIPTION: The GL Budget Tab defines a General Ledger Budget
AD_TABLE.HELP: The GL Budgets are used to define the anticipated costs of doing business. They are used in reporting as a comparison to actual amounts.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, GL_Budget T WHERE GL_Budget_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_Product_Acct
AD_TABLE.HELP: Defines the defaults to use when generating accounting transactions for documents which contain this product.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_Campaign
AD_TABLE.DESCRIPTION: Marketing Campaign Maintain Marketing Campaign Accounting Dimension Tree
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_Campaign T WHERE C_Campaign_ID=:c_ID
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Marketing Campaign defines the parameters for a Campaign. These include a start and end date as well as the amount of any invoices that have been processed which reference this campaign. Please note that you will not be able to create new entities in this window if you have not default set for all mandatory values!

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_Channel
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Marketing Channel Tab defines the different methods or processes through which customers are obtained.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_Channel T WHERE C_Channel_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Element
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Element Tab defines each system level element.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.ColumnName)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, AD_Element T WHERE AD_Element_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Element_Trl
AD_TABLE.HELP: This tab contains the elements translation to different languages. It is important to check the translated option.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_AcctSchema_Element
AD_TABLE.DESCRIPTION: Define the elements of your Account Key
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Account Schema Element defines the elements that comprise the account key. A name is defined which will display in documents. Also the order of the elements and if they are balanced and mandatory are indicated.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_AcctSchema_Element T WHERE C_AcctSchema_Element_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_PInstance
AD_TABLE.HELP: This table is used internally by the application. Whenever a process is called a new line is added to this table including the process identifier and the record that called the process.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.AD_PInstance_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, AD_PInstance T WHERE AD_PInstance_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_PInstance_Para
AD_TABLE.HELP: Process Instance Parameter contains the values of the parameters that are passed to a process instance.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Process
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Report and Process Tab defines each report and process run in the system.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT COALESCE(TO_CHAR(MAX(TT.Name)), TO_CHAR(T.Name)) FROM AD_Process_Trl TT WHERE TT.AD_Process_ID=T.AD_Process_ID AND TT.AD_LANGUAGE=L.AD_LANGUAGE) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, AD_Process T WHERE AD_Process_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Process_Para
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Report Parameter table defines any parameters required to execute a report or process.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, AD_Process_Para T WHERE AD_Process_Para_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Process_Para_Trl
AD_TABLE.HELP: Shows parameter tab translation for several languages
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Process_Trl
AD_TABLE.HELP: Shows report tab translation for several languages This tab contains the process translation to different languages. It is important to check the translated option.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Tree
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Tree table defines all the trees that will be used in the application.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, AD_Tree T WHERE AD_Tree_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_TreeNode
AD_TABLE.HELP: This table defines the relations of nodes for generic trees.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_BPartner
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_BPartner T WHERE C_BPartner_ID=:c_ID
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Business Partner table defines any entity with whom an organization transacts. The entity could be a customer or/and a vendor or/and an employee. Customer defines a Business Partner who is a customer of this organization. If the Customer check box is selected then the necessary fields will display. Vendor defines a Business Partner that is a Vendor for this Organization. If the Vendor check box is selected the necessary fields will display. Employee defines a Business Partner who is an Employee of this organization. If the Employee is also a Sales Representative then the check box should be selected.

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_BPartner_Location
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Location defines the physical location of a business partner. A business partner may have multiple location records.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_BPartner_Location T WHERE C_BPartner_Location_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_PriceList_Version
AD_TABLE.HELP: Price lists are automatically created based on Product Purchasing Information and the Vendor Category Discount.The other alternative is to copy them from existing pricelists and the re-calculate them.You can also re-calculate the pricelist by referencin
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, M_PriceList_Version T WHERE M_PriceList_Version_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_Bank
AD_TABLE.HELP: Defines a bank that is used by an organization or business partner. Each Bank is given an identifying Name, Address, Routing No and Swift Code
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.Codebank)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.Codebranch)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.Digitcontrol) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_Bank T WHERE C_Bank_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_BankAccount
AD_TABLE.HELP: Used to define one or more accounts for a Bank. Each account has a unique Account No and Currency.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TT.Codebank)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TT.Codebranch)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TT.Digitcontrol) FROM C_Bank TT WHERE TT.C_Bank_ID=T.C_Bank_ID) ||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.Digitcontrol)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.Codeaccount) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_BankAccount T WHERE C_BankAccount_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_BP_BankAccount
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Define Bank Account Tab defines the banking information for this business partner. This data is used for processing payments and remittances.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TT.Codebank)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TT.Codebranch)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TT.Digitcontrol) FROM C_Bank TT WHERE TT.C_Bank_ID=T.C_Bank_ID) ||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.AccountNo) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_BP_BankAccount T WHERE C_BP_BankAccount_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_BP_Withholding
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Withholding Tab defines any withholding information for this business partner.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_DocType_Trl
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Translation Tab defines a Document Type in an alternate language.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_Dunning
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Dunning Tab defines the parameters for a dunning level.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_Dunning T WHERE C_Dunning_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_ElementValue_Trl
AD_TABLE.HELP: Defines the translation of the element value to an alternate language
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_PaymentTerm_Trl
AD_TABLE.HELP: The translation defines the payment terms translations for different languages
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_Withholding
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Withholding Rules Tab define the rules governing the withholding of amounts.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_Withholding T WHERE C_Withholding_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_Product_Trl
AD_TABLE.HELP: The translation defines the product name for different languages
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_Charge
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Charge Tab defines the unique charges that may be associated with a document.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_Charge T WHERE C_Charge_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_OrderTax
AD_TABLE.HELP: The table constains the tax amount for an Order based on the lines entered.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_AcctSchema_Default
AD_TABLE.HELP: Defines default accounts for an Accounting Schema. These values will display when a new document is opened. The user can override these defaults within the document.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM C_AcctSchema TT WHERE TT.C_AcctSchema_ID=T.C_AcctSchema_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_AcctSchema_Default T WHERE C_Acctschema_Default_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_Activity
AD_TABLE.DESCRIPTION: Activity for Activity Based Costing Maintain Acitivity Accounting Dimension Tree
AD_TABLE.HELP: Defines tasks that are preformed and in Activity Based Costing.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_Activity T WHERE C_Activity_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_Invoice
AD_TABLE.HELP: Contains all the invoices
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.DocumentNo)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.GrandTotal)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.DateInvoiced) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_Invoice T WHERE C_Invoice_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_InOut
AD_TABLE.HELP: Contains all the material transaction due to business partner shipments
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.DocumentNo)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.MovementDate) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, M_InOut T WHERE M_InOut_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_InOutLine
AD_TABLE.HELP: The table defines the individual line that comprise shipment line
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Line)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.MovementQty)||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.DocumentNo)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TT.MovementDate) FROM M_InOut TT WHERE TT.M_InOut_ID=T.M_InOut_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM M_Product TT WHERE TT.M_Product_ID=T.M_Product_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, M_InOutLine T WHERE M_InOutLine_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_Inventory
AD_TABLE.HELP: Contains all the material transactions due to inventory
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, M_Inventory T WHERE M_Inventory_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_InventoryLine
AD_TABLE.HELP: Contains the counts of the individual products in inventory
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Line)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.QtyCount)||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM M_Inventory TT WHERE TT.M_Inventory_ID=T.M_Inventory_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, M_InventoryLine T WHERE M_InventoryLine_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_Movement
AD_TABLE.HELP: Contains all the material transactions due to movements between warehouses
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.DocumentNo)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, M_Movement T WHERE M_Movement_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_MovementLine
AD_TABLE.HELP: Contains the products and the quantities moved and the location it is moving from and to
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Line)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.MovementQty)||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.DocumentNo)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM M_Movement TT WHERE TT.M_Movement_ID=T.M_Movement_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, M_MovementLine T WHERE M_MovementLine_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_Production
AD_TABLE.HELP: Contains the header of the work effort
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.DocumentNo)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.MovementDate) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, M_Production T WHERE M_Production_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_ProductionLine
AD_TABLE.DESCRIPTION: Produt balance on the work effort
AD_TABLE.HELP: Contains all the products that have been used or created in the production run and the quantities
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Line)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.MovementQty)||' - '||(SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TTT.Name)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TTT.DocumentNo)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TTT.MovementDate) FROM M_Production TTT WHERE TTT.M_Production_ID=TT.M_Production_ID) ||' - '||TO_CHAR(TT.Line) FROM M_ProductionPlan TT WHERE TT.M_ProductionPlan_ID=T.M_ProductionPlan_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, M_ProductionLine T WHERE M_ProductionLine_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_Transaction

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_InvoiceTax
AD_TABLE.HELP: Contains the total tax due based on the Invoice Lines
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.DocumentNo)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TT.GrandTotal)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TT.DateInvoiced) FROM C_Invoice TT WHERE TT.C_Invoice_ID=T.C_Invoice_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT (SELECT COALESCE(TO_CHAR(MAX(TTT.Name)), TO_CHAR(TT.Name)) FROM C_Tax_Trl TTT WHERE TTT.C_Tax_ID=TT.C_Tax_ID AND TTT.AD_LANGUAGE=L.AD_LANGUAGE) ||' - '||(SELECT (SELECT COALESCE(TO_CHAR(MAX(TTTT.Name)), TO_CHAR(TTT.Name)) FROM C_TaxCategory_Trl TTTT WHERE TTTT.C_TaxCategory_ID=TTT.C_TaxCategory_ID AND TTTT.AD_LANGUAGE=L.AD_LANGUAGE) FROM C_TaxCategory TTT WHERE TTT.C_TaxCategory_ID=TT.C_TaxCategory_ID) FROM C_Tax TT WHERE TT.C_Tax_ID=T.C_Tax_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_InvoiceTax T WHERE C_InvoiceTax_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.DocumentNo) FROM C_CommissionRun TT WHERE TT.C_CommissionRun_ID=T.C_CommissionRun_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TTT.Name) FROM C_Commission TTT WHERE TTT.C_Commission_ID=TT.C_Commission_ID) ||' - '||TO_CHAR(TT.Line) FROM C_CommissionLine TT WHERE TT.C_CommissionLine_ID=T.C_CommissionLine_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_CommissionAmt T WHERE C_CommissionAmt_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_RevenueRecognition_Plan
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Revenue Recognition plan is generated then invoicing a product with revenue recognition. With Revenue Recognition, the amount is posted to the Unrecognized revenue and over time or based on Service Level booked to Earned Revenue.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM C_RevenueRecognition TT WHERE TT.C_RevenueRecognition_ID=T.C_RevenueRecognition_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TTT.DocumentNo)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TTT.GrandTotal)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TTT.DateInvoiced) FROM C_Invoice TTT WHERE TTT.C_Invoice_ID=TT.C_Invoice_ID) ||' - '||TO_CHAR(TT.Line)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TT.LineNetAmt) FROM C_InvoiceLine TT WHERE TT.C_InvoiceLine_ID=T.C_InvoiceLine_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_RevenueRecognition_Plan T WHERE C_RevenueRecognition_Plan_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_RevenueRecognition_Run
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TTT.Name) FROM C_RevenueRecognition TTT WHERE TTT.C_RevenueRecognition_ID=TT.C_RevenueRecognition_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TTTT.DocumentNo)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TTTT.GrandTotal)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TTTT.DateInvoiced) FROM C_Invoice TTTT WHERE TTTT.C_Invoice_ID=TTT.C_Invoice_ID) ||' - '||TO_CHAR(TTT.Line)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TTT.LineNetAmt) FROM C_InvoiceLine TTT WHERE TTT.C_InvoiceLine_ID=TT.C_InvoiceLine_ID) FROM C_RevenueRecognition_Plan TT WHERE TT.C_RevenueRecognition_Plan_ID=T.C_RevenueRecognition_Plan_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.DocumentNo) FROM GL_Journal TT WHERE TT.GL_Journal_ID=T.GL_Journal_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_RevenueRecognition_Run T WHERE C_RevenueRecognition_Run_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.HELP: This table contains all the matches between the material receipt lines and the invoice lines. It uses only for the purchase transactions. For each material receipt line we can have one or more invoice lines, so the sum of the invoice lines has to match with his material receipt line own. When everything matches it means the material receipt line is already invoiced

AD_TABLE.HELP: This table contains all the matches between the order lines and: 1. With the material receipt lines. For each order line we can have one or more materials receipt lines. The result of the sum of all the material receipt lines have to match with their own order line in order to be able to say that the order line has been already receipt. 2. With the invoice line. For each order line we can have one or more invoices lines. The result of the sum of all the invoices lines have to much with their own order line in order to be able to say that the order line has been already invoiced

Please note that there are three

AD_TABLE.NAME: K_Synonym
AD_TABLE.HELP: Search Synonyms for Knowledge Keywords; Example: Product = Item
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, K_Synonym T WHERE K_Synonym_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: K_Source
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Source of a Knowlegde Entry is a pointer to the originating system. The Knowledge Entry has an additional entry (Description URL) for more detailed info.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, K_Source T WHERE K_Source_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: K_EntryRelated
AD_TABLE.HELP: Related Knowlege Entry for this Knowledge Entry
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM K_Entry TT WHERE TT.K_Entry_ID=T.K_EntryRelated_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, K_EntryRelated T WHERE K_EntryRelated_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: K_EntryCategory
AD_TABLE.HELP: Assiged Category - Value for the Knowlede Entry
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: K_Entry
AD_TABLE.HELP: The searchable Knowledge Entry
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, K_Entry T WHERE K_Entry_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: K_Comment
AD_TABLE.HELP: Comment regarding a knowledge entry
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.K_Comment_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, K_Comment T WHERE K_Comment_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: K_CategoryValue
AD_TABLE.DESCRIPTION: The value of the category is a keyword
AD_TABLE.HELP: The value of the category is a keyword
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, K_CategoryValue T WHERE K_CategoryValue_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: K_Category
AD_TABLE.HELP: Set up knowledge categories and values as a search aid. Examples are Release Version, Product Area, etc. Knowledge Category values act like keyworks.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, K_Category T WHERE K_Category_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_Country_Trl
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_Currency_Trl
AD_TABLE.HELP: Translations for currencies
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_Project_Header_V
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Value)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM C_Project TT WHERE TT.C_Project_ID=T.C_Project_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_Project_Header_V T WHERE C_Project_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_Project_Details_V
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Line) FROM C_ProjectLine TT WHERE TT.C_ProjectLine_ID=T.C_ProjectLine_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_Project_Details_V T WHERE C_ProjectLine_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: RV_ProjectCycle
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: RV_Asset_Delivery
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: RV_Asset_Customer
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_ProjectIssue
AD_TABLE.HELP: The lab lists the Issues to the project initiated by the "Issue to Project" process. You can issue Receipts, Time and Expenses, or Stock.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Value)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM C_Project TT WHERE TT.C_Project_ID=T.C_Project_ID) ||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.Line)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.MovementQty) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_ProjectIssue T WHERE C_ProjectIssue_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_Product_UOM
AD_TABLE.HELP: Users can define the unit of the order. This does not necessarily need to be the unit which is used for the invoice. For instance diskettes are stocked and accounted in units while are bought in boxes of 10.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT (SELECT COALESCE(TO_CHAR(MAX(TTT.Name)), TO_CHAR(TT.Name)) FROM C_UOM_Trl TTT WHERE TTT.C_UOM_ID=TT.C_UOM_ID AND TTT.AD_LANGUAGE=L.AD_LANGUAGE) FROM C_UOM TT WHERE TT.C_UOM_ID=T.C_UOM_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, M_Product_UOM T WHERE M_Product_Uom_Id=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_AuxiliarInput
AD_TABLE.HELP: To configure an auxiliar input, you need to select the corresponding tab, name the auxiliar inout and define a validation code. For example, when selecting the payment method, you can force that all payments are done in cash.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT (SELECT COALESCE(TO_CHAR(MAX(TTT.Name)), TO_CHAR(TT.Name)) FROM AD_Tab_Trl TTT WHERE TTT.AD_Tab_ID=TT.AD_Tab_ID AND TTT.AD_LANGUAGE=L.AD_LANGUAGE) ||' - '||(SELECT (SELECT COALESCE(TO_CHAR(MAX(TTTT.Name)), TO_CHAR(TTT.Name)) FROM AD_Window_Trl TTTT WHERE TTTT.AD_Window_ID=TTT.AD_Window_ID AND TTTT.AD_LANGUAGE=L.AD_LANGUAGE) FROM AD_Window TTT WHERE TTT.AD_Window_ID=TT.AD_Window_ID) FROM AD_Tab TT WHERE TT.AD_Tab_ID=T.AD_Tab_ID) ||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, AD_AuxiliarInput T WHERE Ad_Auxiliarinput_Id=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_Project_Vendor
AD_TABLE.HELP: Contians all the vendors which have participated in the budgetting of a certain project
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Value)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM C_Project TT WHERE TT.C_Project_ID=T.C_Project_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM C_BPartner TT WHERE TT.C_BPartner_ID=T.C_BPartner_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_Project_Vendor T WHERE C_Project_Vendor_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_ProjectProposal
AD_TABLE.HELP: Contains the budgets assigned to business partners and a project
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Value)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM C_Project TT WHERE TT.C_Project_ID=T.C_Project_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM C_BPartner TT WHERE TT.C_BPartner_ID=T.C_BPartner_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_ProjectProposal T WHERE C_Projectproposal_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_ProjectProposalLine
AD_TABLE.HELP: Contains all budgetted products to a Business Partner detailing information such as quantity, price,…
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TTT.Value)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TTT.Name) FROM C_Project TTT WHERE TTT.C_Project_ID=TT.C_Project_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TTT.Name) FROM C_BPartner TTT WHERE TTT.C_BPartner_ID=TT.C_BPartner_ID) FROM C_Projectproposal TT WHERE TT.C_Projectproposal_ID=T.C_Projectproposal_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_ProjectProposalLine T WHERE C_Projectproposalline_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_ProjectProposalTask
AD_TABLE.HELP: Contains all the tasks that comprise a proposal
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TTT.Value)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TTT.Name) FROM C_Project TTT WHERE TTT.C_Project_ID=TT.C_Project_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TTT.Name) FROM C_BPartner TTT WHERE TTT.C_BPartner_ID=TT.C_BPartner_ID) FROM C_Projectproposal TT WHERE TT.C_Projectproposal_ID=T.C_Projectproposal_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_ProjectProposalTask T WHERE C_Projectproposaltask_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_Incoterms
AD_TABLE.HELP: EXW Ex-works, ex-factory, ex-warehouse, ex-mill. FCA Free carrier (Franco Transportista) FAS (Free alongside ship) FOB (Free on Board) CFR (Cost & Freight) CIF (Cost, Insurance & Freight) CPT (Carriage paid to) CIP (Carriage and Insurance Paid to)
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_Incoterms T WHERE C_Incoterms_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_Product_Template
AD_TABLE.HELP: The product template is used to configure standard orders for a business partner. Can be define as a template for orders. Using templates is a good way to avoid having to repeat the entry of each line of the order when there are few changes.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM C_BPartner TT WHERE TT.C_BPartner_ID=T.C_BPartner_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM M_Product TT WHERE TT.M_Product_ID=T.M_Product_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, M_Product_Template T WHERE M_Product_Template_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_Warehouse_Shipper
AD_TABLE.HELP: This table defines shipper path tracks. Each movil warehouse has a particular track.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM M_Warehouse TT WHERE TT.M_Warehouse_ID=T.M_Warehouse_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM C_BPartner TT WHERE TT.C_BPartner_ID=T.C_BPartner_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, M_Warehouse_Shipper T WHERE M_Warehouse_Shipper_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_Rappel
AD_TABLE.HELP: Contains all the configuration rappels
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, M_Rappel T WHERE M_Rappel_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_Rappel_Productcategory
AD_TABLE.HELP: Contains the discount configuration for the product category
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM M_Rappel TT WHERE TT.M_Rappel_ID=T.M_Rappel_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM M_Product_Category TT WHERE TT.M_Product_Category_ID=T.M_Product_Category_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, M_Rappel_Productcategory T WHERE M_Rappel_Productcategory_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_Rappel_Bpartner
AD_TABLE.HELP: Contains all the configuration rappels. This rappel only applies to business partners recorded on this tab.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM M_Rappel TT WHERE TT.M_Rappel_ID=T.M_Rappel_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, M_Rappel_Bpartner T WHERE M_Rappel_Bpartner_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_Rappel_Invoice
AD_TABLE.HELP: Contains all the invoices generated due to rappels conditions
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.DocumentNo)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TT.GrandTotal)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TT.DateInvoiced) FROM C_Invoice TT WHERE TT.C_Invoice_ID=T.C_Invoice_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, M_Rappel_Invoice T WHERE M_Rappel_Invoice_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_ElementValue_Operand
AD_TABLE.HELP: Indicates the operands used to calculate the amount of this element value.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Value)||' - '||(SELECT COALESCE(TO_CHAR(MAX(TTT.Name)), TO_CHAR(TT.Name)) FROM C_ElementValue_Trl TTT WHERE TTT.C_ElementValue_ID=TT.C_ElementValue_ID AND TTT.AD_LANGUAGE=L.AD_LANGUAGE) FROM C_ElementValue TT WHERE TT.C_ElementValue_ID=T.C_ElementValue_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT VALUE || ' - ' || (SELECT COALESCE(TO_CHAR(MAX(TTT.Name)), TO_CHAR(TT.Name)) FROM C_ElementValue_Trl TTT WHERE TTT.C_ElementValue_ID=TT.C_ElementValue_ID AND TTT.AD_LANGUAGE=L.AD_LANGUAGE) FROM C_ElementValue TT WHERE TT.C_ElementValue_ID=T.Account_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_ElementValue_Operand T WHERE C_Elementvalue_Operand_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_DocType_Copy
AD_TABLE.HELP: This tab sets number of copies for each document by default.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_DocType_Copy T WHERE C_Doctype_Copy_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_DocType_Copy_Trl
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_Debt_Payment
AD_TABLE.HELP: Refers to the amount of money to be paid or collected.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM C_BPartner TT WHERE TT.C_BPartner_ID=T.C_BPartner_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT NAME FROM AD_REF_LIST_V WHERE AD_Language=L.AD_LANGUAGE AND Value=T.PaymentRule AND AD_Reference_ID=195)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.Dateplanned)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.Amount)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.IsReceipt) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_Debt_Payment T WHERE C_Debt_Payment_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_Settlement
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.DocumentNo)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.DateTrx) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_Settlement T WHERE C_Settlement_ID=:c_ID
AD_TABLE.HELP: Termination of a business operation by using its assets to discharge its liabilities. For example, once the goods have been shipped to the customer, the merchant can key a transaction for settlement at which time the customer's credit card is charged for the transaction and the proceeds are deposited into the merchant account.

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_Debt_Payment_Cancel_V
AD_TABLE.HELP: Canceled debt paymet tab allows the debt paymet transformation into a generated debt payment. If you want to add new records in this tab, you must use the Create from button on the settlement tab. Once you have a cancelled debt payment, the only way to ed
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM C_BPartner TT WHERE TT.C_BPartner_ID=T.C_BPartner_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT NAME FROM AD_REF_LIST_V WHERE AD_Language=L.AD_LANGUAGE AND Value=T.PaymentRule AND AD_Reference_ID=195)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.Dateplanned)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.Amount)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.IsReceipt) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_Debt_Payment_Cancel T WHERE C_Debt_Payment_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_Debt_Payment_Generate_V
AD_TABLE.HELP: Using this tab we can generate new debt payments. The cancelled ones and the generated ones must have the same amount. Otherwise it is not possible to process it.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM C_BPartner TT WHERE TT.C_BPartner_ID=T.C_BPartner_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT NAME FROM AD_REF_LIST_V WHERE AD_Language=L.AD_LANGUAGE AND Value=T.PaymentRule AND AD_Reference_ID=195)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.Dateplanned)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.Amount)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.IsReceipt) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_Debt_Payment_Generate T WHERE C_Debt_Payment_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_Glitem
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_Glitem T WHERE C_Glitem_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_Glitem_Acct
AD_TABLE.HELP: Defines the default accounts for this general ledger item.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: **No key found

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_Debt_Payment_Balancing
AD_TABLE.HELP: GL items used to configure the accounting entry related to this debt/payment creation.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TTT.Name) FROM C_BPartner TTT WHERE TTT.C_BPartner_ID=TT.C_BPartner_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT NAME FROM AD_REF_LIST_V WHERE AD_Language=L.AD_LANGUAGE AND Value=TT.PaymentRule AND AD_Reference_ID=195)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TT.Dateplanned)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TT.Amount)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TT.IsReceipt) FROM C_Debt_Payment TT WHERE TT.C_Debt_Payment_ID=T.C_Debt_Payment_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM C_Glitem TT WHERE TT.C_Glitem_ID=T.C_Glitem_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_Debt_Payment_Balancing T WHERE C_Debt_Payment_Balancing_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: Report_Projectproposal
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Value)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM C_Project TT WHERE TT.C_Project_ID=T.C_Project_ID) ||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.Firstname)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.Lastname) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, Report_Projectproposal T WHERE C_Projectproposal_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_Locator_Renting
AD_TABLE.HELP: Contains all the rented locators
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Value) FROM M_Locator TT WHERE TT.M_Locator_ID=T.M_Locator_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, M_Locator_Renting T WHERE M_Locator_Renting_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_AcctSchema_Table
AD_TABLE.HELP: Group of tables that can be posted.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM C_AcctSchema TT WHERE TT.C_AcctSchema_ID=T.C_AcctSchema_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM AD_Table TT WHERE TT.AD_Table_ID=T.AD_Table_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_AcctSchema_Table T WHERE C_Acctschema_Table_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_File
AD_TABLE.HELP: In this table are stored the files (using the name field) attached to different windows.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_File T WHERE C_File_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_WH_Schedule
AD_TABLE.HELP: Contains all the differents schedules for a warehouse. These schedules are used to invoice rented locators
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, M_WH_Schedule T WHERE M_WH_Schedule_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_WH_Period
AD_TABLE.HELP: Contains all the periods for the schedule
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.StartDate)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.EndDate) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, M_WH_Period T WHERE M_WH_Period_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_WH_Period_Invoiced
AD_TABLE.HELP: Contains all the invoices generated due based on the rented locators for that period
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.StartDate)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TT.EndDate) FROM M_WH_Period TT WHERE TT.M_WH_Period_ID=T.M_WH_Period_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.DocumentNo)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TT.DateOrdered)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TT.GrandTotal) FROM C_Order TT WHERE TT.C_Order_ID=T.C_Order_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, M_WH_Period_Invoiced T WHERE M_WH_Period_Invoiced_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_WH_Schedule_Product
AD_TABLE.HELP: Contains all the differents product that will be used in the invoices
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM M_WH_Schedule TT WHERE TT.M_WH_Schedule_ID=T.M_WH_Schedule_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM M_Product TT WHERE TT.M_Product_ID=T.M_Product_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, M_WH_Schedule_Product T WHERE M_WH_Schedule_Product_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_InOutLine_Type
AD_TABLE.HELP: Contains all the periods for a warehouse
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, M_InOutLine_Type T WHERE M_Inoutline_Type_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_Locator_Type
AD_TABLE.HELP: Contains all the differents types for a locator
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, M_Locator_Type T WHERE M_Locator_Type_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_Storage_Detail
AD_TABLE.HELP: Containts the current stock for every product
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM M_Product TT WHERE TT.M_Product_ID=T.M_Product_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Value) FROM M_Locator TT WHERE TT.M_Locator_ID=T.M_Locator_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, M_Storage_Detail T WHERE M_Storage_Detail_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_Storage_Pending
AD_TABLE.HELP: Constains the reserved quantity and the ordered quantity
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, M_Storage_Pending T WHERE M_Storage_Pending_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Table_Post_V
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, AD_Table_Post_V T WHERE AD_Table_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Process_Scheduling
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT (SELECT COALESCE(TO_CHAR(MAX(TTT.Name)), TO_CHAR(TT.Name)) FROM AD_Process_Trl TTT WHERE TTT.AD_Process_ID=TT.AD_Process_ID AND TTT.AD_LANGUAGE=L.AD_LANGUAGE) FROM AD_Process TT WHERE TT.AD_Process_ID=T.AD_Process_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT NAME FROM AD_REF_LIST_V WHERE AD_Language=L.AD_LANGUAGE AND Value=T.WeekDay AND AD_Reference_ID=167)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.TimeFrom)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.TimeTo) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, AD_Process_Scheduling T WHERE AD_Process_Scheduling_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_Debt_Payment_Bal_Replace

AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_Debt_Payment_Bal_Replace T WHERE C_Debt_Payment_Bal_Replace_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.HELP: Defines applicable discounts to the defined prices.

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_Invoice_Discount
AD_TABLE.HELP: Contains the discounts apply to the whole invoice
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.DocumentNo)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TT.GrandTotal)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TT.DateInvoiced) FROM C_Invoice TT WHERE TT.C_Invoice_ID=T.C_Invoice_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_Invoice_Discount T WHERE C_Invoice_Discount_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_BPartner_Discount
AD_TABLE.DESCRIPTION: Defines the Business Partners the discount can be applied to.
AD_TABLE.HELP: Defines the Business Partners the discount can be applied to.

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_DataType
AD_TABLE.HELP: Data type table contains the different types of files that can be attached to the records of the application.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, AD_DataType T WHERE AD_Datatype_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_Remittance_Type
AD_TABLE.HELP: Definition of types of remittances.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_Remittance_Type T WHERE C_Remittance_Type_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Month
AD_TABLE.HELP: It is necessary to configurate the months of the year to the terms of the year.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, AD_Month T WHERE AD_Month_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: AD_Dimension
AD_TABLE.HELP: The dimensions are needed for the multidimensional analisys reports
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Description) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, AD_Dimension T WHERE AD_Dimension_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: AT_Test
AD_TABLE.DESCRIPTION: This window contains all the instructions of the applicaction.
AD_TABLE.HELP: This window contains all the instructions of the applicaction.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, AT_Test T WHERE AT_Test_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: AT_Command

AD_TABLE.DESCRIPTION: This tab contains instructions lines. Is based on AT_Line

AD_TABLE.NAME: AT_RolLogin

AD_TABLE.HELP: This window defines different ways of login in the application for tests.
