AD_TABLE.NAME: AT_TestDocumentLine
AD_TABLE.HELP: This tab contains the document text configuration
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, AT_TestDocumentLine T WHERE AT_Testdocumentline_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_Paymenttermline
AD_TABLE.HELP: Line in a Pyament Term
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_Paymenttermline T WHERE C_Paymenttermline_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_InvoiceLine_AcctDimension
AD_TABLE.HELP: Accounting dimension
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TTT.DocumentNo)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TTT.GrandTotal)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TTT.DateInvoiced) FROM C_Invoice TTT WHERE TTT.C_Invoice_ID=TT.C_Invoice_ID) ||' - '||TO_CHAR(TT.Line)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TT.LineNetAmt) FROM C_InvoiceLine TT WHERE TT.C_InvoiceLine_ID=T.C_InvoiceLine_ID) ||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.Amt) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_InvoiceLine_AcctDimension T WHERE C_Invoiceline_Acctdimension_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: A_Amortization
AD_TABLE.HELP: Refers to all the depreciations ocurred btween two dates
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.StartDate)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.EndDate) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, A_Amortization T WHERE A_Amortization_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: A_Amortizationline
AD_TABLE.HELP: Depreciation of an asset between two dates
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, A_Amortizationline T WHERE A_Amortizationline_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_Offer
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Price Adjustments has a vigence period and are applicated for the configurated business partners, products, product categorys and partners groups. The offer can be percentual, fixed or set.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, M_Offer T WHERE M_Offer_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_Offer_BPartner
AD_TABLE.HELP: Used to select the business partners related to the Price Adjustment.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM M_Offer TT WHERE TT.M_Offer_ID=T.M_Offer_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM C_BPartner TT WHERE TT.C_BPartner_ID=T.C_BPartner_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, M_Offer_BPartner T WHERE M_Offer_Bpartner_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_Offer_BP_Group
AD_TABLE.HELP: Used to select the groups of business partners related to the price adjustment.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM M_Offer TT WHERE TT.M_Offer_ID=T.M_Offer_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM C_BP_Group TT WHERE TT.C_BP_Group_ID=T.C_BP_Group_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, M_Offer_BP_Group T WHERE M_Offer_Bp_Group_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_Offer_Product
AD_TABLE.HELP: Used to select the different products related to the Price Adjustment.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM M_Offer TT WHERE TT.M_Offer_ID=T.M_Offer_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM M_Product TT WHERE TT.M_Product_ID=T.M_Product_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, M_Offer_Product T WHERE M_Offer_Product_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_Offer_Product_Cat
AD_TABLE.HELP: Used to select the different categories of products related to the Price Adjustments.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM M_Offer TT WHERE TT.M_Offer_ID=T.M_Offer_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM M_Product_Category TT WHERE TT.M_Product_Category_ID=T.M_Product_Category_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, M_Offer_Prod_Cat T WHERE M_Offer_Prod_Cat_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: MA_Section
AD_TABLE.HELP: In section table it's defined each section.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, MA_Section T WHERE MA_Section_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: MA_Machine
AD_TABLE.HELP: In this tab is defined each machine of the enterprise.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Value)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, MA_Machine T WHERE MA_Machine_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: MA_WorkStation
AD_TABLE.HELP: In this table it's defined the work station. It's indicated to which section belongs and the GFHs of preparations and work.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, MA_Workstation T WHERE MA_Workstation_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: MA_MachineStation
AD_TABLE.HELP: In this table are assigned to each station the correspondent machines.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, MA_Machinestation T WHERE MA_Machinestation_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: MA_Process
AD_TABLE.HELP: In this table are described the diferent process that are done in the work station.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, MA_Process T WHERE MA_Process_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: MA_Toolset_Type
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Toolset Type tab is used to detail the different types of toolsets that exist.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, MA_Toolset_Type T WHERE MA_Toolset_Type_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: MA_Toolset
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Toolset tab is used to detail the different types of toolsets that each company has.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Value) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, MA_Toolset T WHERE MA_Toolset_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: MA_ToolsetProcess
AD_TABLE.DESCRIPTION: Toolset process configuration Toolset configuratio for process use.
AD_TABLE.HELP: In case that are needed in this tab are introduced the diferent toolset used in the selected process. In case that are needed in this tab are introduced the diferent toolset used in the selected process.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, MA_ToolsetProcess T WHERE MA_Toolsetprocess_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: MA_Incidence
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Work incidence table is used to describe incidences,
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, MA_Incidence T WHERE MA_Incidence_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: MA_ProcessPlan
AD_TABLE.HELP: In this table is defined the header of the process plan.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, MA_ProcessPlan T WHERE MA_Processplan_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: MA_Sequence
AD_TABLE.HELP: In the Sequence table there are defined all the processes that belongs to the selected process plan.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, MA_Sequence T WHERE MA_Sequence_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: MA_SequenceProduct
AD_TABLE.HELP: In this table there are defined all the products involved in the sequence. There must be defined both the raw materials and the generated products.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM M_Product TT WHERE TT.M_Product_ID=T.M_Product_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, MA_SequenceProduct T WHERE MA_Sequenceproduct_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: MA_WorkRequirement
AD_TABLE.HELP: In this table it's defined the header of the requirement. here it's indicated for example the process plan.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.DocumentNo)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.StartDate) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, MA_WorkRequirement T WHERE MA_Workrequirement_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: MA_WRPhase
AD_TABLE.HELP: In this table there are defined the diferent phases of the work requirement. Each phase corresponds to a sequence of the selected process plan.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.DocumentNo)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TT.StartDate) FROM MA_Workrequirement TT WHERE TT.MA_Workrequirement_ID=T.MA_Workrequirement_ID) ||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.SeqNo)||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM MA_Process TT WHERE TT.MA_Process_ID=T.MA_Process_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, MA_WRPhase T WHERE MA_Wrphase_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: MA_WRPhaseProduct
AD_TABLE.HELP: In this tab there are defined all the products involved in the work requirement phase. There must be defined both the raw materials and the generated products.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, MA_WRPhaseProduct T WHERE MA_Wrphaseproduct_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: MA_WEEmployee
AD_TABLE.DESCRIPTION: Employee registration and configuration for production.
AD_TABLE.HELP: In this table are introduced all the employees that have participate on the work effort.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, MA_WEEmployee T WHERE MA_Weemployee_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: MA_WEIncidence
AD_TABLE.HELP: In this table are all the incidences that may have happened.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, MA_WEIncidence T WHERE MA_Weincidence_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: MA_ToolsetUsed
AD_TABLE.HELP: In this tab are introduced the diferent toolset used in the production run.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Value) FROM MA_Toolset TT WHERE TT.MA_Toolset_ID=T.MA_Toolset_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TTT.Name)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TTT.DocumentNo)||' - '||TO_CHAR(TTT.MovementDate) FROM M_Production TTT WHERE TTT.M_Production_ID=TT.M_Production_ID) ||' - '||TO_CHAR(TT.Line) FROM M_ProductionPlan TT WHERE TT.M_ProductionPlan_ID=T.M_ProductionPlan_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, MA_ToolsetUsed T WHERE MA_Toolsetused_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: MA_WETechnicalSupport
AD_TABLE.HELP:
In this tab are introduced all the technical supports done during the work
effort.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, MA_WETechnicalSupport T WHERE MA_Wetechnicalsupport_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: MA_DefaultPlan
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, MA_DefaultPlan T WHERE M_Product_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: MA_ProductType
AD_TABLE.HELP: The product type defines any products role at any production chain: raw material, intermediate product, final product, consume product,...
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, MA_ProductType T WHERE MA_Producttype_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: MA_CostCenter
AD_TABLE.HELP: In this table is configured each cost center.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, MA_CostCenter T WHERE MA_Costcenter_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: MA_SequenceProduct_Cost
AD_TABLE.HELP: This tab contins de production costs configuration
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, MA_SequenceProduct_Cost T WHERE MA_Sequenceproduct_Cost_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: MA_ProcessPlan_Version
AD_TABLE.HELP: This table allows different production plan versions
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM MA_Processplan TT WHERE TT.MA_Processplan_ID=T.MA_Processplan_ID) ||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.DocumentNo) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, MA_ProcessPlan_Version T WHERE MA_Processplan_Version_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: MA_CalcStd
AD_TABLE.HELP: Standard calculation costs registration is generated automatically
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.DocumentNo)||' - '||(SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TTT.Name) FROM MA_Processplan TTT WHERE TTT.MA_Processplan_ID=TT.MA_Processplan_ID) ||' - '||TO_CHAR(TT.DocumentNo) FROM MA_Processplan_Version TT WHERE TT.MA_Processplan_Version_ID=T.MA_Processplan_Version_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, MA_CalcStd T WHERE MA_Calcstd_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: MA_CCP_Group
AD_TABLE.HELP: Allows the CCP grouping
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, MA_CCP_Group T WHERE MA_CCP_Group_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: MA_CCP
AD_TABLE.HELP: This tab contains each of the measures that will be controled.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, MA_CCP T WHERE MA_Ccp_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: MA_Measure_Group
AD_TABLE.HELP: This tab contains the CCP data registered on this group
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM MA_CCP_Group TT WHERE TT.MA_CCP_Group_ID=T.MA_CCP_Group_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Measuredate) FROM MA_Measure_Shift TT WHERE TT.MA_Measure_Shift_ID=T.MA_Measure_Shift_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, MA_Measure_Group T WHERE MA_Measure_Group_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: MA_Measure_Time
AD_TABLE.HELP: This tab defines the time of the gathering.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TTT.Name) FROM MA_CCP_Group TTT WHERE TTT.MA_CCP_Group_ID=TT.MA_CCP_Group_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TTT.Measuredate) FROM MA_Measure_Shift TTT WHERE TTT.MA_Measure_Shift_ID=TT.MA_Measure_Shift_ID) FROM MA_Measure_Group TT WHERE TT.MA_Measure_Group_ID=T.MA_Measure_Group_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, MA_Measure_Time T WHERE MA_Measure_Time_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: MA_Measure_Values
AD_TABLE.HELP: In this table gathering values are registered.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, MA_Measure_Values T WHERE MA_Measure_Values_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: MA_consumeProduct
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Product tab is used to detail the product which at the same time needs to be activated in the Product window.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM M_Product TT WHERE TT.M_Product_ID=T.M_Product_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, MA_ConsumeProduct T WHERE MA_Consumeproduct_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: MA_ConsumeRM
AD_TABLE.HELP: The Raw Materials tab is used to detail the raw materials which compose a product,

AD_TABLE.NAME: MA_Sequence_IC
AD_TABLE.HELP: Table where is stored each indirect standard cost amount for a sequence.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM MA_Indirect_Cost TT WHERE TT.MA_Indirect_Cost_ID=T.MA_Indirect_Cost_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, MA_Sequence_IC T WHERE MA_Sequence_Ic_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: MRP_Planner
AD_TABLE.HELP: Planner of the MRP
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, MRP_Planner T WHERE MRP_Planner_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: MRP_SalesForecast
AD_TABLE.HELP: In this table are stored the expected sales.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM C_BPartner TT WHERE TT.C_BPartner_ID=T.C_BPartner_ID) ||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.DateDoc) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, MRP_SalesForecast T WHERE MRP_Salesforecast_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: MRP_SalesForecastLine
AD_TABLE.HELP: In this table are stored the expected sale lines.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM M_Product TT WHERE TT.M_Product_ID=T.M_Product_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TTT.Name) FROM C_BPartner TTT WHERE TTT.C_BPartner_ID=TT.C_BPartner_ID) ||' - '||TO_CHAR(TT.DateDoc) FROM MRP_Salesforecast TT WHERE TT.MRP_Salesforecast_ID=T.MRP_Salesforecast_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, MRP_SalesForecastLine T WHERE MRP_Salesforecastline_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_Requisition
AD_TABLE.HELP: Contains the requirements for the materials. This requirements have a date and it's possible to assign a vendor
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.DocumentNo)||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM C_BPartner TT WHERE TT.C_BPartner_ID=T.C_BPartner_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, M_Requisition T WHERE M_Requisition_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: M_RequisitionLine
AD_TABLE.HELP: The table defines the individual line that comprise a requisition
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.DocumentNo)||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TTT.Name) FROM C_BPartner TTT WHERE TTT.C_BPartner_ID=TT.C_BPartner_ID) FROM M_Requisition TT WHERE TT.M_Requisition_ID=T.M_Requisition_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM M_Product TT WHERE TT.M_Product_ID=T.M_Product_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, M_RequisitionLine T WHERE M_Requisitionline_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: MRP_PlanningMethod
AD_TABLE.HELP: The planning method sets the inputs that are taken into account for the planning processes.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, MRP_PlanningMethod T WHERE MRP_Planningmethod_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: MRP_PlanningMethodLine
AD_TABLE.HELP: The planning method line sets the filter options for the input types of the planning methods.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM MRP_Planningmethod TT WHERE TT.MRP_Planningmethod_ID=T.MRP_Planningmethod_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT NAME FROM AD_REF_LIST_V WHERE AD_Language=L.AD_LANGUAGE AND Value=T.Inouttrxtype AND AD_Reference_ID=800098)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.Daysfrom)||' - '||TO_CHAR(T.Daysto) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, MRP_PlanningMethodLine T WHERE MRP_Planningmethodline_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: MRP_Run_Production
AD_TABLE.HELP: Headers of the production planning processes.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name)||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM MRP_Planner TT WHERE TT.MRP_Planner_ID=T.MRP_Planner_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM M_Product TT WHERE TT.M_Product_ID=T.M_Product_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, MRP_Run_Production T WHERE MRP_Run_Production_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: MRP_Run_ProductionLine
AD_TABLE.HELP: Lines of the production planning processes.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name)||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TTT.Name) FROM MRP_Planner TTT WHERE TTT.MRP_Planner_ID=TT.MRP_Planner_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TTT.Name) FROM M_Product TTT WHERE TTT.M_Product_ID=TT.M_Product_ID) FROM MRP_Run_Production TT WHERE TT.MRP_Run_Production_ID=T.MRP_Run_Production_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM M_Product TT WHERE TT.M_Product_ID=T.M_Product_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TTT.DocumentNo)||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TTTT.Name) FROM C_BPartner TTTT WHERE TTTT.C_BPartner_ID=TTT.C_BPartner_ID) FROM M_Requisition TTT WHERE TTT.M_Requisition_ID=TT.M_Requisition_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TTT.Name) FROM M_Product TTT WHERE TTT.M_Product_ID=TT.M_Product_ID) FROM M_Requisitionline TT WHERE TT.M_Requisitionline_ID=T.M_Requisitionline_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM MA_Processplan TT WHERE TT.MA_Processplan_ID=T.MA_Processplan_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, MRP_Run_ProductionLine T WHERE MRP_Run_Productionline_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: MRP_Run_Purchase
AD_TABLE.HELP: Headers of the purchase planning processes.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name)||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM MRP_Planner TT WHERE TT.MRP_Planner_ID=T.MRP_Planner_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM C_BPartner TT WHERE TT.C_BPartner_ID=T.Vendor_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM M_Product_Category TT WHERE TT.M_Product_Category_ID=T.M_Product_Category_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM M_Product TT WHERE TT.M_Product_ID=T.M_Product_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM C_BPartner TT WHERE TT.C_BPartner_ID=T.C_BPartner_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, MRP_Run_Purchase T WHERE MRP_Run_Purchase_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: MRP_Run_PurchaseLine
AD_TABLE.HELP: Lines of the purchase planning processes.
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name)||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TTT.Name) FROM MRP_Planner TTT WHERE TTT.MRP_Planner_ID=TT.MRP_Planner_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TTT.Name) FROM C_BPartner TTT WHERE TTT.C_BPartner_ID=TT.Vendor_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TTT.Name) FROM M_Product_Category TTT WHERE TTT.M_Product_Category_ID=TT.M_Product_Category_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TTT.Name) FROM M_Product TTT WHERE TTT.M_Product_ID=TT.M_Product_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TTT.Name) FROM C_BPartner TTT WHERE TTT.C_BPartner_ID=TT.C_BPartner_ID) FROM MRP_Run_Purchase TT WHERE TT.MRP_Run_Purchase_ID=T.MRP_Run_Purchase_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TT.Name) FROM M_Product TT WHERE TT.M_Product_ID=T.M_Product_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(TTT.DocumentNo)||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TTTT.Name) FROM C_BPartner TTTT WHERE TTTT.C_BPartner_ID=TTT.C_BPartner_ID) FROM M_Requisition TTT WHERE TTT.M_Requisition_ID=TT.M_Requisition_ID) ||' - '||(SELECT TO_CHAR(TTT.Name) FROM M_Product TTT WHERE TTT.M_Product_ID=TT.M_Product_ID) FROM M_Requisitionline TT WHERE TT.M_Requisitionline_ID=T.M_Requisitionline_ID) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, MRP_Run_PurchaseLine T WHERE MRP_Run_Purchaseline_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: I_Tax
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, I_Tax T WHERE I_Tax_ID=:c_ID

AD_TABLE.NAME: C_Acct_Rpt_Group
AD_TABLE.SQL_RECORD_IDENTIFIER: SELECT TO_CHAR(T.Name) AS COLUMN_IDENTIFIER FROM (SELECT AD_LANGUAGE FROM AD_LANGUAGE WHERE AD_LANGUAGE=:c_language) L, C_Acct_Rpt_Group T WHERE C_Acct_Rpt_Group_ID=:c_ID
